attributes.review: Just downloaded this app because White Power 2020 babyyyyy! But instead it’s not accepting my phone number and letting me sign up! Is this a communist page?? I’m trying to donate and can’t even create an account to do so. THIS IS AMERICA and I can’t even get this app to work?!! I bet it’s not working because Hilarys emails. So annoying.
attributes.title: Ughhh Poor Site Management

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it was absolutely disturbing as soon as I opened Trump’s nudes were there!! He has a tiny penis!!🍤🤏🏾🤏🏾 It was so disturbing and disgusting and I’m kinda embarrassed for him, I mean how would you feel if you were president and your nudes were posted all over social media and your own app?😳😳 I would definitely not recommend this app!!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP🍤🍤🤏🏾

attributes.review: This app will steal your phone. I kid you not I downloaded it because I wanted to check out our “presidents” app and it stole my phone. I’m currently writing this review on my fridge but that’s besides the point. Basically don’t download it because a man dressed as a Cheeto will be in your dreams screaming “make❤️🤍💙AMERICA ❤️🤍💙great❤️🤍💙AGAIN❤️🤍💙 and you don’t want that to happen so...
attributes.title: Chair🧚🏾‍♀️✨🥰 BUT MAKE IT Electric....

attributes.review:
This app is absolutely awful. When I got it and opened it, I was greeted by the image of a 
shriveled up clementine in a suit. How disgusting??!?!?!?!? I was horrified and will never be the same. Whoever this trump guy is needs to pay for my therapy from this traumatic experience. I wish I could give it a ZERO star rating. Unbelievable. Watch out you’ll be hearing from my lawyers 😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: Lame

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get all the updates on my beloved trumpy trump boy and as soon as i opened the app this repulsive grotesque stench appeared out of no where! I passed out then regained consciousness in a pool of my own vomit, (not pleasant to say the least!) as soon as I deleted the app the stench disappeared. Over all I would give this app a 0 stars out of 5. Very stinky app!!! do not get!!!!.
attributes.title: stinky!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see my favorite Cheeto, as soon as I open the app my phone kept turning off, then I heard a whisper from my phone saying “get this Cheeto out of here” I ignored it and opened the app again soon later I started smelling pickles then I looked down at my body to see that I turned into a green pickle I’m stuck like this now😔
attributes.title: Pickle

attributes.review: Whatever you do, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! After opening it for the first time, the app crashed and my phone screen turned black and then blue. Protect your devices and save yourself from the frustration of having to go get a new phone! I fully expect the trump administration to reimburse me for my phone that THEIR APP BROKE!!!
attributes.title: I got a virus on my phone as soon as I opened the app

attributes.review: The spray tan is so strong I cannot see anything but orange now. I will require a medical surgery to properly see again and I will be forwarding the bill to the President. Don’t download the app if you want to still be able to see the color of your children’s eyes as they say ‘I love you’. Just another thing Trump has taken from me.
attributes.title: My eyes are seared

attributes.review: It is so glitchy and keeps showing pics of oranges 🍊 please fix. I downloaded this app and then my grandma had a heart attack. Coincidence? Maybe. But then my brother broke his leg. Coincidence again? unlikely. But it gets worse than my can of bean spilled on the floor and happened to be corona infested. Coincidence? Most Definitely not. Don’t get this app.
attributes.title: this app is horrible

attributes.review: so basically when I opened the app it was a Cheeto staring at me and it had these weird lips it’s like they were stuck. you know how sometimes people play with Pringle chips and pretend that they are a duck, that’s what he’s lips looked like, i was terrified. also it showed me the same Cheeto trying to WORKOUT!! that was horrifying and disturbing. horrible app.
attributes.title: this app is disgusting 🤢
